sickie.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a day when you say that you are sick and do not go to work, even though you are not really sick
sickie.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Looks like he’s thrown another sickie (=pretended to be sick and not gone to work).
sickie.translation[1].definitions[0].def: when you say that you are ill and do not go to work, even though you are not really ill
sickie.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He was so fed up that he decided to throw a sickie instead of going into the office.
